title: Check Status of a Factory Order
description: A customer who placed a factory order for a new vehicle is calling to get a status update.

tasks.description: Get the customer's order number or name.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the customer's order details.

tasks.description: Check the vehicle's status in the production pipeline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the vehicle's status is 'In Production - Paint Shop'.

tasks.description: Provide the customer with the current status and the estimated completion and delivery dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent informs the customer of the current stage and the estimated delivery window.
